About.title: About Me
About.description1: I am a backend engineer specializing in .NET and C#, focused on building APIs, modular backends, and clean architecture. I work with SQL databases and practical DevOps tools like Docker and CI/CD pipelines to deliver reliable systems.
About.description2: I care about maintainability, modularity, and clear architecture more than just shipping code. I enjoy code reviews, documentation, and sharing knowledge with teams. I use AI-assisted development tools like Copilot, but I always review and validate the code manually—design and validation remain my responsibility.

Contact.description: If you're looking for someone to design and build clear, maintainable backend systems in .NET, I'd be happy to talk. You can reach me by email or through LinkedIn.
